text:
So for us, when we look at
the exponential technologies,

it's like machine
learning, it's blockchain,
it's low-code, it's generative AI.
The first important thing is

about getting enterprise
systems over to the cloud.

And by doing that, we get
much better reliability,

lower cost of our
infrastructure, better security.

And one example here
is our AI/ML platform,

which is built on SageMaker
AWS Lambda, for example.
We are having much lower scrap levels,
need much less inventory,
have much better transport planning.

And by that, we're saving 50
million US dollars in value.

It makes our salespeople
able to put much more time

with the customers and
less on administration.

It's very much about responsible
business, sustainability,

also compliance, and the
last thing we are addressing
through this 300 solutions is efficiency.

For us, AWS is a great
partner for us to be able
to radically transform
through intelligent automation and AI.
